hr.fer.zemris.java.hw13.sql

Class SQLDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • hr.fer.zemris.java.hw13.sql.SQLDAO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DAO

    public class SQLDAO
extends java.lang.Object
implements DAO
    Implementation of DAO subsystem using SQL. This implementation expects that connection is available through SQLConnectionProvider class.
